name: Doom Creeper
movement: walk 15 ft., climb 45 ft., burrow 10 ft.
description: The Doom Creeper is a small plant creature with a formidable presence. It has a swift, agile form, capable of climbing and burrowing effectively, with a blend of slashing and necrotic attacks.
memorable: Its combination of debilitating abilities and necrotic damage makes the Doom Creeper a tactically challenging foe.
goals: Typically seeks to immobilize or debilitate opponents while dealing damage.
relations: It may be found in areas with other plant creatures or magical beings.
environment: Usually found in magical forests or overgrown areas.
strengths: High agility with a +5 Dexterity modifier and formidable defensive capabilities through resistances and immunities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage and low strength limits physical confrontation.
attacks: Utilizes Decaying Vine attacks for slashing and necrotic damage, with a magical beam attack that inflicts debilitating effects.
most_powerful_ability: Death's Rose allows for a range of debilitating effects such as incapacitation and fear.
senses: Blindsight out to 60 feet allows it to detect creatures without relying on sight.
skills: Possesses average perception skills with a +2 modifier.
additional_information: Resistant to bludgeoning and piercing damage.
Immune to blinded, deafened, and poisoned conditions.
Has notable speed with the ability to climb and burrow.
Can inflict a range of debilitating conditions with its magical abilities.
Lacks social prowess with a very low charisma score.
test_queries: small agile plant in magical forests
